trans-unit.source: Provides a method that when implemented, resolves a latitude/longitude location to a civic address.
trans-unit.target: メソッドを提供として実装された場合、都市の住所緯度/経度の場所を解決します。

trans-unit.source: To resolve a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> to a <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress> asynchronously, implement <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>, and provide the civic address data to the <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 解決するのには、<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>を<xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress>、非同期的に実装<xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>、都市の住所データを提供し、<xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted>イベント</xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted></xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A></xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress></xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>。

trans-unit.source: Resolves a <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> to a civic address synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 解決、 <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref>同期的に、都市に対処します。

trans-unit.source: The latitude/longitude location to resolve to an address.
trans-unit.target: アドレスに解決するのには緯度/経度場所です。

trans-unit.source: Resolves a <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> to a civic address synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 解決、 <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref>同期的に、都市に対処します。

trans-unit.source: Initiates a request to resolve a latitude/longitude location to an address.
trans-unit.target: 緯度/経度の場所をアドレスに解決する要求を開始します。

trans-unit.source: The latitude/longitude location to resolve to an address.
trans-unit.target: アドレスに解決するのには緯度/経度場所です。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an asynchronous request using <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync*> to resolve a latitude/longitude to a civic address is complete.
trans-unit.target: 非同期要求を使用して、ときに発生<xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync*>緯度/経度都市の住所が完了を解決するのには</xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync*>。
